city selection modal is displayed

elements.name: Ensure selected city is displayed beside Sign In

steps.name: user has selected a city from the modal
the selected city should be displayed beside the "Sign In" option
user changes the city from the dropdown
the newly selected city should be displayed beside "Sign In"

city selection modal is displayed

the search results should display relevant cities
user should be able to select the city from search results

user is on the BMS home page for gift card test
city selection modal is displayed for gift card test
user selects a city from the modal for gift card

elements.name: Validate error message for invalid gift card voucher

steps.name: user navigates to the Gift Card section
user should see the "Check Gift card balance" icon
user clicks on the "Check Gift card balance" icon
user enters an invalid voucher code "INVALID123"
user submits the voucher for balance check
user should see an error message "Invalid Gift voucher Code. (#-4426)"
user is on the BMS home page for login
city selection modal is displayed for login
user selects default city from the modal

elements.name: Ensure login UI elements are visible and functional

steps.name: user clicks on "Sign In"
"Continue with Mobile Number" option is visible
all input fields and buttons are enabled and visible
user is on the BMS home page for login
city selection modal is displayed for login
user selects default city from the modal

elements.name: Valid login and back navigation with different numbers

steps.name: user clicks on "Sign In"
user enters a valid random mobile number "8936820040"
user clicks on "Continue"
OTP input screen is displayed
user clicks on the back button
user is taken back to the login method selection screen

city selection modal is displayed for login
user selects default city from the modal
